name: Hyper Space (itch)
description:
Hyper Space

Is a 2D Retro classic top down arcade spaceship endless shooter.

It draws influence from classic arcade games from arcade machines and early endless shooters.

The goal for Hyper Space is to achieve the highest score possible, by surviving and defeating enemies to increase your score. Players are shown their score upon death to show them how many points they achieved. 

The key mechanics of this game are;

-Shooting

-Player wrapping( being able to cross the horizontal boarders and appear on the other side of the screen)

-Enemies tracking player movement

-enemy health

-boss enemies
